T04sanss18u:192: na dharmaḥ śuddheṣu pravartate kṣateṣu na pravartate /

T04sanss18u:198: rātryāṃ vā pravartate divā na pravartate /
T04sanss18u:204: na dharmasyônatvaṃ na pūrṇatvam aprameyâsaṃkhyeyo hi dharmâkāśavan na kṣīyate na vardhate /

T04sanss18u:229: tatra bodhisatvasya saṃgham anusmarataḥ evaṃ bhavati /

T04sanss18u:243: yāvanto loka pāṣaṇḍāḥ sarvatra pravrajanti te /
T04sanss18u:245: candrā vā bhonti sūryā vā śakrabrahmaprajêśvarāḥ /
T04sanss18u:246: bhavanti āpas tejaś ca pṛthivī mārutas tathā //
T04sanss18u:248: yena te satva mucyante sukhī bhonti a-
T04sanss18u:256: ye câpi nirayāḥ kecid buddhakṣetreṣv acintiṣu /
T04sanss18u:260: kāmabhogāṃś ca darśenti dhyānaṃ ca dhyāyināṃ tathā /
T04sanss18u:261: vidhvasta māraṃ kurvanti avatāraṃ na denti te //
T04sanss18u:262: agnimadhye yathā padmam abhūtaṃ taṃ vinirdiśet /

T04sanss18u:269: daridrāṇāṃ ca satvānāṃ nidhānā bhonti akṣayāḥ /
T04sanss18u:270: teṣāṃ dānāni datvā ca bodhicittaṃ janenti te //

T04sanss18u:278: ceṭā bhavanti dāsā vā śiṣyatvam upayānti ca //
T04sanss18u:279: yena yenâiva câṅgena satvo dharmarato bhavet /
T04sanss18u:282: yeṣām anantā śikṣā hi anantaś câpi gocaraḥ /
T04sanss18u:285: buddhair api vadadbhis tu guṇântaḥ suvaco bhaved /
T04sanss18u:287: raśmi pramuñciya mālyaviyūhā mālyavataṃsaka mālya vitānāḥ /
T04sanss18u:290: cūrṇavicitravikīrṇa samantān te jinapūja karonti maha-ātmā //
T04sanss18u:296: raśmi pramuñciya dhvajâgraviyūhā te dhvaja pāṇḍuralohitapītāḥ /
T04sanss18u:299: paṭṭa patāka pralambita dāmā kiṅkiṇijāla jinasvaraghoṣān //
T04sanss18u:300: chatra dharenti tathāgatamūrdhne te yathâikajinasya karonti /

T04sanss18u:318: yātuka dharmamukhāḥ pratiyantaḥ te tu samantavimokṣamukhena //
T04sanss18u:319: satva vinenti yathâśaya loke ye tu samantavimokṣamukhena /
T04sanss18u:320: satva vinenti yathâśaya loke teṣa nimitta na śakya grahītuṃ //
T04sanss18u:321: kenacid eṣa samādhivikurvāḥ tena tivyūhata [[DOUBT]] agrasamādhiḥ /
T04sanss18u:323: cintiya darśayi sarva vinenti yatra durbhikṣa sudurlabha sarvaṃ /

T04sanss18u:325: dātu dadanti karonti jagârthaṃ te varabhojanapānarasâgraiḥ /
T04sanss18u:330: rūpa vidarśiya satva vinenti darśana prītipraharṣaratānāṃ /
T04sanss18u:332: rūpadhimukti jagad vinayanti te madhuraiḥ kalaviṅkarutebhī /
T04sanss18u:334: ye catur evâśīti sahasrā yebhi jinā jagato 'rtha karonti /
T04sanss18u:335: tebhita dharmaprabhedamukhebhiḥ satva vinenti yathâśaya loke //
T04sanss18u:337: sarvakriyāsu sahāya bhavitvā satva vinenti sahāyamukhena //
T04sanss18u:339: tebhi sahāya sahantiya pīḍāṃ sarvajagasya hitāya sukhāya //
T04sanss18u:340: yatra na niṣkramaṇaṃ na ca dharmo jñāyati raṇyagato na ca mokṣaḥ /
T04sanss18u:345: te daśa carya prabhāvayamānâcari dharma mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ /
T04sanss18u:346: sarvam aśeṣata carya ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvayamāna karonti jagârthaṃ //
T04sanss18u:348: tatra jarârdita vyādhinapṛṣṭā darśayi mṛtyuvaśaṃ avaśâtmā //
T04sanss18u:350: prajvalitaṃ jaravyādhitamṛtyu loka nidarśayi satva vinenti //
T04sanss18u:352: buddhamahâtma tu sūcayamānāḥ buddhaguṇebhi karonti jagârtham //
T04sanss18u:354: darśayamāna tathāgata ṛddhī ṛddhivikurvita satva vinenti //
T04sanss18u:358: loki alipta jale yatha padmaṃ prītiprasādakarā vicaranti //
T04sanss18u:359: kāvyakarāḥ kavirāja bhavantī te naṭanartaka jhallakamallāḥ /
T04sanss18u:362: grāmika nāyaka sārathi bhontī sârthika śreṣṭhika gṛhapati bhonti /
T04sanss18u:366: arcciya santu tu loka viditvā karmavidhīṣu ajānaka satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:369: vidyabalâuṣadhi śāstravicitrāḥ sarva prabhāvita tebhi ṛṣībhiḥ //
T04sanss18u:370: ye ṛṣiṇāṃ caraṇāḥ paramâgrā yatrâdhimukta sadevaku lokaḥ /
T04sanss18u:371: ye vrataduṣkara ye tapaśreṣṭhāḥ sarvi prabhāvita tebhi vidūbhiḥ //
T04sanss18u:376: dīrghajaṭāna kumāravratānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
T04sanss18u:378: cārika tīrthya daśa tritayānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
T04sanss18u:383: ye muṣaleśaya [[DOUBT]] yuktivihārī teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
T04sanss18u:384: yāvata bāhirakāḥ pṛthutīrthyâśaya teṣv adhimukti samīkṣya /
T04sanss18u:388: sūkṣmapadebhir upāyana yebhī satyaprakāśana teṣu karonti //
T04sanss18u:397: te yathasatya niruktividhijñâivam aśeṣata ye jinadharmā /
T04sanss18u:402: raśmim acintiyam utsṛjamānā raśmi pramuñciya satva vinenti //
T04sanss18u:403: raśmi pramuñciya darśayamānā yāvata satva vijānita raśmi /
T04sanss18u:404: teṣu sudarśana bhoti amogham hetu anuttari jñānavarasya //
T04sanss18u:405: darśayi buddha vidarśayi dharmaṃ saṃgha nidarśayi mārga narāṇām /
T04sanss18u:406: darśayi cetika te jinabimbā tena sudarśanaraśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:408: raśmi pramuñci prabhaṃkara nāmā yā prabha jihma karoti marūṇāṃ /
T04sanss18u:409: sarvarajaṃ ca tamaṃ ca hanitvā so prabha bhāsati lokahitānāṃ //
T04sanss18u:410: tāya prabhāsaya codita satvās te jinapūjapradīpa dharentī /
T04sanss18u:411: te jinapūjapradīpa dharitvā lokapradīpakarā jina bhonti //
T04sanss18u:412: tailapradīpa ghṛtasya pradīpā dāru tṛṇā naḍaveṇu pradīpān /
T04sanss18u:414: raśmi pramuñciya pratāraṇi nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:416: dūṣita saṃskṛta varṇita śāntī tena pratāraṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:417: raśmi pipāsavinodani nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:425: prītikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:426: prītiphuṭā varabodhinidānaṃ cinta janenti bhaviṣya svayaṃbhū //
T04sanss18u:428: bhāṣita buddhaguṇāḥ sada kālaṃ prītikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:429: raśmi pramuñci ratiṃkara nāmā tāya prabhāsaya bodhita satvā /
T04sanss18u:430: buddharatīrata dharmaratīrata saṃgharatīrata te sada bhonti //
T04sanss18u:432: labdhanupattikakṣānti labhanti codita smārita ye bahu satvā //
T04sanss18u:435: puṇyasamuccayaraśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
T04sanss18u:436: dānu dadanti vicitram anekaṃ prārthayamānu anuttaru bodhiṃ //
T04sanss18u:437: āśaya pūritu yācanakānāṃ yajña nirargaḍa tair yajamānaiḥ /
T04sanss18u:438: sarvabhiprāyata dānu daditvā puṇyasamuccaya raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:439: jñānavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:440: eka tu dharma mukhātu anekā dharmamukhān avabuddhi kṣaṇena //
T04sanss18u:442: dharmaprabheda ... grāhita satvān arthaviniścaya jñāna vibhaktī /
T04sanss18u:444: dharmapadârthavibhāṣaṇa kṛtvā jñānavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:445: prajñapradīpayâusari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:448: dharmâsvāmika śūnya nirīhān bhāṣati prajñapradīpa nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:449: dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
T04sanss18u:451: dharmadharāṇu parigrahu kṛtvā dhārmikarakṣa karitva ṛṣīṇāṃ /
T04sanss18u:452: dharmânugraha kṛtva jagasya dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:453: tyāgavatī yada raśmi vimuñcī tāya ya matsara codita satvā /
T04sanss18u:456: bṛṃhita tyāga prasannam anena tyāgavatīprabha tena nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:457: niṣparidāha yâusari raśmiḥ tāya duḥśīlaya codita satvā /
T04sanss18u:458: śīlaviśuddhi pratiṣṭhita bhūtvā cinta janenti bhaveya svayaṃbhūḥ //
T04sanss18u:460: karmapathe kuśale pariśuddhe śīla samādayi yad bahusatvān /
T04sanss18u:461: bodhayi citta samādayanena raśmi nivṛtta sa niṣparidāhaḥ //
T04sanss18u:463: kṣāntiviyūha yâusari raśmi tāya yâkṣama codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:464: krodhakhilaṃ adhimāna jahitvā kṣāntiratīrata te sada bhonti //
T04sanss18u:466: varṇita kṣāntiguṇāḥ sadakālaṃ tena nivṛtta sa kṣāntiviyūhā //
T04sanss18u:467: raśmi uttaptavatī yada muñcī tāya kuśīdaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:468: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karonti akhinnaprayogāḥ //
T04sanss18u:469: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karitvâkhinnaprayogāḥ /
T04sanss18u:470: te catu mārapathâtikrāntāḥ kṣipra spṛśanti anuttara bodhiṃ //
T04sanss18u:471: vīrya samādayi yad bahusatvān pūja karitva triṣū rataneṣu /
T04sanss18u:472: dharma dharitva kṣayaṃgata kāle tenôtaptavatī prabha labdhā //
T04sanss18u:473: śāntikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya vibhrāntaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:474: teṣu na rāgu na dveṣa na mohāḥ bodhita bhonti samāhita cittāḥ //
T04sanss18u:475: pāpa kumitra kiliṣṭa carīye saṃgaṇikāvinivartana kṛtvā /
T04sanss18u:476: varṇita dhyāna praśāntâraṇye śāntikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:477: prajñaviyūha yâusari raśmī tāya duḥprajña saṃcodita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:478: satyapratītya vimokṣanaye 'smin nidriya jñānagatiṃ gata bhonti //
T04sanss18u:484: rājyadhanâtmapriyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhinidānaṃ /
T04sanss18u:485: taṃ ca satkṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajñaviyūhāḥ //
T04sanss18u:486: buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:489: buddhabalâviprabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:490: te 'bhayaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāyâbhayârdita satva saspṛṣṭāḥ /
T04sanss18u:492: ye 'bhayena nimantrita satvāḥ prāṇibadhāt tu nivārita bhonti /
T04sanss18u:493: trāyita yaccharaṇâgata bhītās tena bhayaṃdada raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:496: rogavinodani mūla phaloṣadha ratna rasāyana gandhanulepān /
T04sanss18u:497: phāṇita kṣīra madhū ghṛta telān bhojana pāna daditvaya labdhā //
T04sanss18u:499: buddhanidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sacoditâyu kṣayānte /
T04sanss18u:500: buddhânusmari paśyiṣu buddham te cyuta gacchi sabuddhakkṣetraṃ //
T04sanss18u:501: kāla karonti ca smārita buddhā darśitaprītakarā
T04sanss18u:504: buddhagatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇânte bhāsiya buddhanidarśani labdhā //
T04sanss18u:505: dharmaprabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvā /
T04sanss18u:506: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti // /
T04sanss18u:508: chanda janitva prayujyatha dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā //
T04sanss18u:509: ghoṣavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī buddhasutā paricodanatāyāṃ /
T04sanss18u:510: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti //
T04sanss18u:513: te 'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:514: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogaṃ //
T04sanss18u:517: raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:522: ya stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā //
T04sanss18u:523: ratnaviyūha yâusari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:524: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn //
T04sanss18u:525: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ /
T04sanss18u:526: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛtta ya ratnaviyūhāḥ //
T04sanss18u:527: gandhaprabhāsa yâusari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanss18u:528: ghrātvâmānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti //
T04sanss18u:535: raśmi prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalôpama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ /
T04sanss18u:536: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā //
T04sanss18u:537: muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati meghaṃ /
T04sanss18u:541: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīn nagnâcela subhūṣaṇa bhontī /
T04sanss18u:544: raśmi rasâgravatī yada muñcī bhukṣita bhojya rasâgra labhantī /
T04sanss18u:545: bhojana pāna vicitra rasâgrān datva rasâgravatī prabha labdhā //
T04sanss18u:546: arthanidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratnanidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ /
T04sanss18u:548: cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram /
T04sanss18u:549: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:550: śrotraviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śrotravihīna śruṇī pṛthuśabdān /
T04sanss18u:552: ghrāṇaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn ghrāyi aghrāyitapūrva sugandhān /
T04sanss18u:553: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:554: jihvaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn snigdhamanojñarutai stuti buddhān /
T04sanss18u:555: vāca durukta vivarjita rukṣā ślakṣṇôdīrita raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:556: kāyaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn indriyahīna suindriya bhonti /
T04sanss18u:557: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhvā //citta-
T04sanss18u:559: viśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacita bhavanti /
T04sanss18u:560: citta samādhivaśânuga kṛtvā cittaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:561: rūpaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn paśyiya cintiya rūpanarêndrān /
T04sanss18u:563: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabdâśabdata śūnya vijānī /
T04sanss18u:564: pratyaya jāta pratiśrutatulyaṃ śabdaprakāśana raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanss18u:565: gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī /
T04sanss18u:568: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasâgrāḥ /
T04sanss18u:570: sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī /
T04sanss18u:571: śaktitriśūlâsi [[DOUBT]] tomaravarṣā mālya mṛdū padumôtpala bhontī //
T04sanss18u:572: duṣyâneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānāṃ /
T04sanss18u:575: dharmaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān /
T04sanss18u:578: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā //
T04sanss18u:579: raśmi sukhāpramukhêti kṛtvâikatu romamukhāt tu ṛṣīṇāṃ /
T04sanss18u:581: te yathâikata romamukhāto osari gaṅgarajôpama raśmī /
T04sanss18u:582: evam aśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhivikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ //
T04sanss18u:583: yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve /
T04sanss18u:584: teṣu tam eva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇâiṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ //
T04sanss18u:585: teṣa ya puṇya sahāyaka pūrve yair anumodita yācita yebhiḥ /
T04sanss18u:586: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhôpacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣāṃ //
T04sanss18u:587: ye ca śubhôpacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ /
T04sanss18u:588: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karotiya raśmiḥ //
T04sanss18u:590: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī nô ca sa nâsti udeti sa loke /
T04sanss18u:594: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
T04sanss18u:596: ābharaṇāni nipāna vimānāḥ ratna rasāyana gandhanulepāḥ /
T04sanss18u:597: te pi tu asti mahâtmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānāṃ //
T04sanss18u:598: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
T04sanss18u:600: yasy imu [[DOUBT]] raśmiprabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyanti śraddadhimukti [[DOUBT]] prasādaḥ /
T04sanss18u:601: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nâṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ //
T04sanss18u:607: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī //
T04sanss18u:608: ye paripācita tena ṛṣīṇāṃ satva niṣpa-dita buddhaguṇeṣu /
T04sanss18u:609: te parivāri ataṃ mahapadmaṃ sarvôdikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ //
T04sanss18u:614: yauvanavegasthiteṣu samāhita vyutthihi jīrṇaka vṛddha śarīrāḥ /
T04sanss18u:620: pratyaya buddha śarīri samāhita vyutthihi buddhavarâgraśarīrā /
T04sanss18u:626: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu /
T04sanss18u:627: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ //
T04sanss18u:628: ekatu vālapathasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata vālapathebhyaḥ /
T04sanss18u:629: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramâṇurajātaḥ //
T04sanss18u:636: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānāṃ //
T04sanss18u:640: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalānu mahâtmā //
T04sanss18u:641: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt /
T04sanss18u:642: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita vyutthihi te gaganânusmṛtîmān //
T04sanss18u:644: kalpâcintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum //
T04sanss18u:647: te ca vaśe sthitâṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvakâika bhavībahu bhontī /
T04sanss18u:648: bhūtva bahuḥ punâika bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin //
T04sanss18u:649: te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhi anarthiku lokôpekṣī /
T04sanss18u:650: darśayi kāyavikurvâcintyā kasya na darśayi loka hitâiṣī //
T04sanss18u:651: candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsaṃ /
T04sanss18u:656: evam acintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ /
T04sanss18u:658: sāgaradeva rutāvatināmā yāvat satva samudry utpannā /
T04sanss18u:659: teṣu svarâṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena //
T04sanss18u:660: sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣa vidhijñā /
T04sanss18u:661: dhāraṇidharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam //
T04sanss18u:662: māyakaro yatha vidyavidhijño darśayi rūpa vicitrânantān /
T04sanss18u:664: māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokaṃ /
T04sanss18u:665: dhyānâbhijña vimokṣasuśikṣita kasya na toṣayi caryavidhijñaḥ //
T04sanss18u:666: rāhu yathêṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade talabandhaṃ /
T04sanss18u:667: darśana sāgaru nābhipramāṇaṃ bhoti sumerutale sama śīrṣaḥ //
T04sanss18u:668: so 'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayîdṛśa ṛddhī /
T04sanss18u:669: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi anantā //
T04sanss18u:671: yātuka bimbaranekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmaṇi śakru svakāyān //
T04sanss18u:673: sarvasurêndrasurāś ca vijānī śakrama ... purato gata svâyum /
T04sanss18u:674: eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurêndrāḥ //
T04sanss18u:675: netra sahasra bhayaṅkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītaṃ /
T04sanss18u:676: varmita kāya durāsada teja śakram udīkṣya palātv asurêndrāḥ //
T04sanss18u:678: sarvajagasyâśeṣata trāṇāṃ akṣayapuṇya kuto na vikurvī // ...
T04sanss18u:679: vāyuta saṃbhuta meghapravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī /
T04sanss18u:680: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhâvaha sarvajagasya //
T04sanss18u:681: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyuḥ /
T04sanss18u:682: darśayi lokavipākâcintyā kasya na darśayi te varalabdhā //
